column5: Taking my dad perch fishing tomorrow. Anyone know the depths they are at this time of year? Point Abino, Maitland, Burwell, or long point?.... I haven't been out since early in the year(abino) so I'm out of the loop......
Been out to Port Burwell Saturday, catch them by hyndreds in 48FoW fish at 30-35' most keepers 8" or more...good luck!!!
Ok, he suggested burwell as well.....
Any word on the Port Maitland area? Hope to be down there soon.
Been catching some from shore recently in dover. Shouldn't be much of a ride to get to em right now.
